attributes.action: Oppose Sweden's proposal to divide Jerusalem & call on the palestinians to resume negotiations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not the prerogative of the European Union to determine the borders of the territories in dispute regarding the Israeli-palestinian conflict. The final status of Jerusalem and other disputed should only be determined in negotiations between Israel and the palestinians and not by any other party. We the undersigned call on the prime minister to oppose the proposal by Sweden to divide Jerusalem and urge President Abbas to immediately resume negotiations with Israel without preconditions.
